title: You May Die (Intro)
lyrics:
Intro to OutKast’s 1996 album ATLiens. The track has been sampled in many other hip-hop songs, most notably Ab-Soul’s “Beautiful Death”, and Young Buck’s “The City”.
[Intro]
Nada de novo vem do sol
Tudo de novo vem do Nosso Senhor
A vida é uma continuação
O Nosso Senhor é que dá a nossa vida, Amém
[Verse]
You can be sure
Some go low to get high
You may hurt 'til you cry
You may die (You may die)
Keep on trying (Keep on trying)
'Til it's summer, in the city
'Til it's summer, in the city
